body: top-notch art & dialogue, but mmc (president jun) is a manipulative piece of shit, so this winds up more creepy than erotic ... too bad
Anyone looking for a wholesome story turn back now. With this author it's gonna be an ntr fest; the best you can hope for here is netorase.
I honestly do not understand Ryoh-zoh. Great art, but everything turns into NTR. I still haven't read itaiamai because I'm waiting to see if it becomes NTR.
@satsujin Maybe eventually, I do like most of Ryoh-zoh's works. But after Hinamix, I kinda wanna have 294900 and 352697 translated, so I'll probably commission one of those next.
@xevry ok, thanks, I'll be waiting. Btw, do you planning to comission translations of "Love to Like EZR"?

@satsujin Somewhat frequently. I know chapter 2 and 3’s translations are done and are waiting to be proofread. Once they are and I get the translations, it won’t take me too long to edit/ upload. 

Also I only commissioned for the 1st 9 chapters, but I plan to commission the other 7, so there will probably be a longer wait after chapter 9.
@xevry How fast updates will be?
This is going to be NTR, we all know it
Thank you naikkusu. Already a turn off of the fact that I got major bad vibes from Jun.
the first part 160393, and the last part 196882

Spoiler warning: after three chapter, no two chapter it become netorase, the president aka bastard like his girl to fucked by other men idk why fuck this shit don't waste your time to this if you're snowflake. well at least they happy together 
ps. im not snowflake or anything, im just want to warn a snowflakes or ppl who dislike ntr or netorase

What’s the twist gonna be? Pimped out to earn student council funds? Turned into the club’s pet masochist? Mind broken to the degree she lives in a trash can like Oscar the Grouch? My heart has been foolishly broken too many times that it’s practically a Kintsugi piece.

What the....everything went too fast from page 10,me still processing....ok 1 more minute....hmmmm.....ok,nice one,good comedy,me fav.
And please,stop the vanilla vs ntr war,ok it's canon at this rate,but why not simply blacklist each others tag and just,uhm....keep reading doujin instead of fight?

LOL why are you guys so sour? Right, some of us hate NTRash for what it is but then, they bring in some of the best art out there. Don't be salty, just the enjoy the art like I do and fuck the story if it's too much for you to handle. I read them, I get the gist of the story and then I bounce out while appreciating the art.

Skimmed a couple of the raws and this is dogshit with a sprinkle of horseshit on top, ryoh put everything but the kitchen sink in this one and it's a fucking mess there's rape, blackmail, gangbang, cheating, netorase and borderline ntr, also two of the characters look like future ntr antagonists, plus the writing is trash as well. Thanks but no thanks, unless you're a sad ugly virgin cuck like @bangrd chances are you won't like how this steaming pile of shit progresses.
Good shit alright 👍🙂👌

Guys if you, like me, hates this piece of shit author who in EVERY his works turn the story into ntr you can blacklist him, go to your profile and click on black list then - author- search his name and block this scum author, I hope that his mangaka career will fail, as like any author ntr, all my homies hates ntr
